snippet.title: Black Knight Sword Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Did you get your Daily Fix?
http://bit.ly/QXorfh

Invoking old-school side-scrolling action games, Black Knight Sword is a strange little game that launched on XBLA and PSN this week.

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming:
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment

Black Knight Sword Launch Trailer
